WorkItem.ClosedComment: 4.1.05 Released. If this is still an issue, please reopen with exact steps to reproduce and any necessary character files
WorkItem.Description:
I heard it should be disabled by default but I noticed it listed [checked] in the buffs tab's list when importing from battle.net.
 
It's not technically a bug but intuitively it seems wrong since getting focus magic is rare and it's even weak on arcane mages if I'm not mistaken.
 
[the character I had noticed it is http://eu.battle.net/wow/en/character/lightnings-blade/fateswarm/advanced]
 
edit: oops, I had forgotten to add it's on an arcane mage importation but I guess that's sorted now since the bug is accepted as fixed.
WorkItem.Summary: [Mage] Focus Magic on buff list by default when importing from battle.net
